subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Camp Lejeune water pollution, cancer link investigated

06/12/07 07:59 PM, EDT
Some 75,000 Marines and their families at Camp Lejeune in North Carolina were exposed to toxic tap water that may have caused cancer and birth defects in people who lived on the base, a federal health official testified Tuesday.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
U.S. allies, enemies on blacklist for human trafficking

06/12/07 07:57 PM, EDT
Saudi Arabia, Malaysia and other U.S. allies aren't doing enough to combat human trafficking, according to a State Department report, and the countries could face sanctions if they don't take steps to improve. 
FULL STORY
